doc.name: ExecutionTimeAttributes
doc.description: Container for decorator attributes that are provided to actors by a ExecutionAspect that schedules execution times. The ExecutionAspect decorates actors in a model with the attributes contained by this object.
doc.author: Patricia DerlerEdward A. Lee
doc.property: The executionTime parameter specifies the execution time of the decorated object. This means the time that the decorated actor occupies the decorator resource when it fires. This is a double that defaults to 0.0.
